name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・昼公演】AZKi Major Debut LiVE「声音エントロピー」【#AZKiワンマン #AZKiワンマン横浜昼】 [2ZvJOnftaSI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Short interlude between songs where AZKi thanks the audience.

subtitles.original: たとえ世界が悲しみに溢れたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if the world is filled with sadness,

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だから
subtitles.english: It'll be okay,

subtitles.original: そばにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'll be by your side.

subtitles.original: 君に笑ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: I want you to smile.

subtitles.original: 今生まれた君を探しているの
subtitles.english: I'm looking for you, who was just born.

subtitles.original: 転んでもただ走り続けていく
subtitles.english: Even if I fall, I'll just keep on running.

subtitles.original: 今を知って明日を投げた
subtitles.english: Knowing the present, I cast away tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 心が叫びたがってる
subtitles.english: My heart wants to scream.

subtitles.original: タイムマシンに乗ってさ
subtitles.english: If I could take a time machine

subtitles.original: 別の未来を選ぶことができたなら
subtitles.english: and choose a different future,

subtitles.original: 君のいない世界を想像する
subtitles.english: imagining a world without you—

subtitles.original: そんな世界は想像できない
subtitles.english: I can't imagine such a world.

subtitles.original: 届いてるよね？
subtitles.english: It's reaching you, right?

subtitles.original: この声がこの歌が
subtitles.english: This voice, this song...

subtitles.original: 何回何十回だって君を選ぶから
subtitles.english: No matter how many times, I'll choose you.

subtitles.original: 夜が滲んでいく水平線の彼方へ
subtitles.english: Towards the horizon where the night blurs,

subtitles.original: 響く鼓動の音を
subtitles.english: The sound of my echoing heartbeat,

subtitles.original: 確かに感じた
subtitles.english: I certainly felt it.

subtitles.original: 始めよう君との未来を
subtitles.english: Let's start our future together.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ手を離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go of my hand.

subtitles.original: 大きな声で名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Call out my name with a loud voice.

subtitles.original: 奇跡を駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Run through the miracle,

subtitles.original: どこまでもいけるよ
subtitles.english: we can go anywhere.

subtitles.original: ここからもう一度
subtitles.english: From here, once more

subtitles.original: 君と私で始めよう
subtitles.english: let's start together, you and me.

subtitles.original: 無限の中に生まれた物語を
subtitles.english: The story born within the infinite,

subtitles.original: 君とどこまでも
subtitles.english: forever with you.

subtitles.original: この世界が悲しみに溢れたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if this world is filled with sadness,

subtitles.original: 私は歌を歌い続けていく
subtitles.english: I will keep on singing my song.

subtitles.original: 君と生きるここでこの場所で
subtitles.english: Living with you here, in this place,

subtitles.original: それが私の世界だ
subtitles.english: that is my world.

subtitles.original: その一分一秒が煌めく
subtitles.english: Every minute, every second sparkles.

subtitles.original: Yeah
subtitles.english: Yeah

subtitles.original: 傷つき涙を流す君が
subtitles.english: I pray that the world becomes a place

subtitles.original: 幸せだと思える世界になりますように
subtitles.english: where you, who are hurt and shedding tears, can feel happy.

subtitles.original: 願いを込めて歌う
subtitles.english: I sing with a prayer in my heart.

subtitles.original: ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 私最強で最弱な
subtitles.english: I'm the strongest and the weakest,

subtitles.original: 弱気な心をスーツで隠して
subtitles.english: hiding my timid heart with a suit.

subtitles.original: 正体はいつも負けない
subtitles.english: My true self never gives up.

subtitles.original: 強い私でいさせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me be my strong self.

subtitles.original: いくぞ、横浜！
subtitles.english: Let's go, Yokohama!

subtitles.original: 今日も一日スマートにライド
subtitles.english: Another day of riding through smartly,

subtitles.original: 人をすり抜け早歩きステーション
subtitles.english: slipping through the crowd and walking fast to the station.

subtitles.original: タスク処理して定時で帰るの
subtitles.english: Processing tasks and heading home on time,

subtitles.original: ビール飲み干して爆睡寝るだけ
subtitles.english: draining a beer and just falling into a deep sleep.

subtitles.original: みんなが思ってるような
subtitles.english: Since when did I start acting

subtitles.original: 私を演じたのはいつから？
subtitles.english: the way everyone expects me to?

subtitles.original: わかんなくなってぐちゃぐちゃになっても
subtitles.english: Even if I get confused and everything becomes a mess,

subtitles.original: 信じていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep on believing.

subtitles.original: 私最強で最弱な
subtitles.english: I'm the strongest and the weakest,

subtitles.original: 弱気な心をスーツで隠して
subtitles.english: hiding my timid heart with a suit.

subtitles.original: 正体はいつも負けない
subtitles.english: My true self never gives up.

subtitles.original: 強い私でいさせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me be my strong self.

subtitles.original: 鏡に映る私を
subtitles.english: Looking closely at the person

subtitles.original: じっと見つめる最強最弱
subtitles.english: reflected in the mirror—strongest, weakest.

subtitles.original: 毎日飛び乗り通勤
subtitles.english: Hopping on for the daily commute,

subtitles.original: ノマドもリモートなんのその
subtitles.english: don't care about nomads or remotes.

subtitles.original: 評価気になり辛くても
subtitles.english: Even if caring about evaluations is tough,

subtitles.original: 明日はきっと笑えてる
subtitles.english: I'll surely be laughing tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 信じて信じて何度裏切られても
subtitles.english: Believing, believing, no matter how many times I'm betrayed,

subtitles.original: 何度だって立ち上がれる
subtitles.english: I can stand up over and over again.

subtitles.original: 私は最強最弱だ
subtitles.english: I am the strongest and the weakest!

subtitles.original: みんなが思ってるような
subtitles.english: I am not someone who belongs

subtitles.original: 私はいて誰のものでもないの
subtitles.english: to anyone, despite what everyone thinks.

subtitles.original: わかんなくなってボロボロになっても
subtitles.english: Even if I get confused and worn out,

subtitles.original: 立ち続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep on standing.
